name: Drama en el barrio La Jota: ¡Co!
description:
Drama en el barrio La Jota: ¡Co! is a game made for the 2008 Bytemaniacos adventure competition. It is a text-based visual novel. At different moments in the story up to four options are provided to continue. The player chooses an option and then the story continues.

The adventure follows the young boy Zaragoza who live in the La Jota neighborhood on the left bank of Zaragoza. One day he decides to skip class to play football with his friends instead. The game incorporates satire with sociocultural criticism on the balance between the attitude of certain young people and older generations.
